alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Dale, northern Henry, northern Coffee, northwestern Clay, northern Randolph and Quitman Counties through 1045 PM EDT/945 PM CDT/... At 1011 PM EDT/911 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lumpkin to near Osco to Goshen. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Georgetown, Cuthbert, Fort Novosel, Ariton, Lee, Mixons Crossroads, Wire Bridge, Curtis, Watson Crossroads, Scottsboro Crossroads, Ricks Place, Roeton, Thomas Mill Creek, Phillips Crossroads, Arcus, Hatcher and Morris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
